spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is strong. However, the kitchen peninsula length is slightly over-extended compared to the blueprint. The distance between the entrance door and the living area is compressed.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present and correctly adjacent. Most doors are represented, though the bathroom door for Monica's room shows a strange orientation/geometry. Hallucination detected in the entryway with an extra wall segment.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of the iconic living room and kitchen set. The dining table chair count and orientation are accurate. Bedroom furniture follows the blueprint closely.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering with clean clay-shader aesthetic. Soft lighting and shadows provide clear depth. Minor geometry clipping on some door frames.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen peninsula extends further into the living space than indicated on the 2D floor plan.
Secondary bathroom door shows inward-folding geometry not represented in the swing arc of the blueprint.
Hallucinated partial wall/divider introduced near the main entrance leading to Chandler & Joey's apartment.
The window in Rachel's bedroom is wider than the specified dimension in the structural drawing.
Rendering artifact on the top of the central storage unit/closet wall appearing as non-manifold geometry.
